2.title: Baaghi 2 Movie Review: Tiger Shroff Roars, Disha Patani Is Pretty But This Is Just A 2.5-Hour Stunt Show
2.body: Cast: Tiger Shroff, Disha Patani, Prateik Babbar, Manoj bajpayee, Randeep Hooda, Deepak DobriyalDirector: Ahmed KhanRating: 2 stars (out of 5)In Baaghi 2, rebellion -trigger happy, brooding endlessly and snarling at everything in sight -comes in a single standard size, the one that the beefy Tiger Shroff embodies in all its skin-deep splendour.

3.title: 'Captain Cry Baby' – British press mocks Steve Smith
3.body: Cricket Australia has announced a review into team culture in the wake of the South Africa ball-tampering scandal.

4.title: Karnataka Election LIVE Updates: BJP Chief Amit Shah Arrives at Mysore Palace
4.body:
After embarking on the two-day tour to old Mysore, BJP chief Amit Shah has now arrived at the Mysore Palace to meet the erstwhile royal family, triggering speculations about their joining the BJP.
As part of his 'Karunada Jagruti Yatre', Shah will tour Mysuru, Chamarajanagara, Mandya and Ramanagara districts on March 30 and 31.

5.title: News website founder held for publishing false report
5.body: BENGALURU: Mahesh Vikram Hegde, founder of news website PostCard News was on Thursday arrested by Central Crime Branch (CCB) police for allegedly publishing false news about an accident in which a Jain seer was injured.

6.title: DU student murdered by man he met through dating app: Delhi Police
6.body: Ajay Chaudhary, joint commissioner of police (New Delhi) said the victim was killed by the man named Ishrat Ali,25, on the night of March 22.

7.title: US wants visa applicants to submit phone, email, social media details
7.body:
The State Department estimates that the new visa forms would affect 710,000 immigrant and 14 million non-immigrant visa applicants.
The State Department estimates that the new visa forms would affect 710,000 immigrant visa applicants and 14 million non-immigrant visa applicants.

8.title: Case registered against BJP's Babul Supriyo on charges of disrupting public order
8.body: Supriyo, the Minister of State for Heavy Industries and Public Enterprises, has accused CM Mamata Bannerjee of ignoring the tense ground situation." The state government has been told repeatedly that if they cannot control the situation, let central forces come in.

9.title: CBSE paper leak LIVE Updates: Outrage spreads from Delhi to Ludhiana, student faints while protesting
9.body:
1: 06 pm: The Delhi police crime branch had questioned 32 people yesterday in connection with the alleged leak of question papers for the 10th and 12th CBSE examinations.
com/H5bWlc3ywJ— TIMES NOW (@TimesNow) March 30, 201812: 37 pm: Delhi crime branch has questioned CBSE Controller of Exams for four hours over the paper leak.

11.title: LTCG tax, other Budget proposals to kick in from April 1
11.body: The 2018-19 Budget had after a gap of 14 years reintroduced 10 per cent tax on LTCG exceeding Rs 1 lakh from sale of shares.

14.title: Baaghi 2 movie review: The Tiger Shroff starrer has more fight than bite
14.body:
Baaghi 2 movie cast: Tiger Shroff, Disha Patani, Manoj Bajpayee, Randeep Hooda, Deepak Dobriyal, Prateik Babbar Baaghi 2 movie director: Ahmed Khan Baaghi 2 movie rating: 2.
You wish they had more to do, even Prateik Babbar who returns to the screen after a long gap, and tries too hard for menace as a drug-addled crazy.

16.title: Asansol communal clashes: I want peace, if you strike back I will leave, says imam who lost his son
16.body: But we do recognise his exemplary gesture in maintaining peace in the region,” Tapas Banerjee, Trinamool Congress MLA of Asansol South, said on Friday morning.

17.title: Baaghi 2 movie review: Tiger Shroff pounds his way through a marginally suspenseful, largely robotic film
17.body: tags: #Baaghi 2 #Baaghi Tiger Shroff #Bollywood #Darshan Kumar #Disha Patani #Kshanam #Manoj Bajpayee #Movie review #Prateik Babbar #Tiger Shroff “One man army… Against all… Kick… Punch… Fly… Repeat” – these words flash on screen during the trailer of Baaghi 2.

18.title: Bihar violence: SWAT swings into force, restores normalcy; top developments
18.body: Nearly 50 people, including two local BJP workers, were on Thursday held in Samastipur and Nalanda districts of Bihar in connection with communal clashes that erupted in the last couple of days across several areas, including Bhagalpur and Aurangabad.

19.title: Next up from PM, book on stress relief after lives destroyed by paper leaks: Rahul
19.body: NEW DELHI: Congress president Rahul Gandhi on Friday kept up his attack on Prime Minister Narendra Modi over the CBSE leaks, saying he would now write a sequel to his book "Exam Warriors" to teach students stress relief after their lives were "destroyed" due to paper leaks.

20.title: Indian Railways Recruitment Board exam: 5 tips to prepare for the examination
20.body: New Delhi: As the Centre announces another 20,000 in vacancies in the Indian Railways, the total number of vacancies are now up to 1,10,000 from the existing 90,000.

21.title: Hurry Up! SBI offer on attractive interest rates, processing fee waiver on home loans closes on March 31
21.body:
As per SBI, the housing loan is given for the purpose of purchase/ construction, extension, repairs and renovation of a new or second-hand residential house or flat, among others.
Moreover, a maximum permissible LTV ratio of 75% is applicable on a loan amount above Rs 75 lakh.

22.title: Baaghi 2 Box Office: Tiger Shroff Will Get 2018's Biggest Opening, Say Early Reports
22.body: Starring Tiger Shroff and Disha Patani, Baaghi 2 witnessed 45-50 per cent occupancy across 3,400 theatres in India, stated the report, making it top the list of highest first day occupancy recorded by 2018 releases.

23.title: Jio Prime expires on March 31 for everyone: Should you worry?
23.body:
On April 1, 2017, RIL chairman Mukesh Ambani launched an annual subscription service called Jio Prime to offer exclusive benefits to millions of its users.
Do not panicFirst things first, Jio Prime members need not panic at the news of the subscription coming to an end.

24.title: WhatsApp Makes It Easier to Inform Friends About Your New Number
24.body:
WhatsApp is now making it easier to let you notify particular contacts about you having changed your phone number.
As reported by folks at WABetaInfo, the new Change Number feature is rolling out through a server-side update to WhatsApp for Android beta version 2.
You can download the latest WhatsApp for Android beta by visiting Google Play.

25.title: Baaghi 2 movie review: Tiger Shroff's action entertains but Rambo like attempt defies logic
25.body: RATING: 3/5MOVIE: Baaghi 2CAST: Tiger Shroff, Disha Patani, Manoj Bajpayee, Randeep Hooda, Prateik BabbarDIRECTOR: Ahmed KhanGENRE: Action thrillerThe Hollywood movie Rambo starring Sylvester Stallone is a classic when it comes to action genre, and there is nothing wrong to make a Bollywood flick try to take a similar approach, but one shouldn't disregard logic.

28.title: Amit Shah tells Siddaramaiah in his home turf that his "time"
28.body: Shah said Siddaramaiah was mistaken if he and his government thought they could stall saffron ideology from spreading by unleashing violence against BJP and RSS workers." In politics, there is no room for violence.

30.title: AIADMK to organise hunger strike on Cauvery issue on April 2
30.body: Stalin said the Tamil Nadu government should have approached the apex court with a contempt petition when the Union Minister for Water Resources and the Union Water Resources Secretary spoke against the apex court order on constituting the CMB.
